channel.title: RSS feed based on News Manager
channel.description: RSS feed based on News Manager

item.title: 29.05.2013 - Upcoming SAP Innovation Live Webinars – Registration now open!
item.description: Invite customers and partners to the upcoming live expert session related to SAP Business Suite Innovations. They’ll receive insights on how the new business function prediction self-service and SAP Enterprise Support Academy offerings support innovation projects for SAP enhancement packages.

item.title: 13.05.2013 - Now Available: Focused Business Solutions Sales Information Card
item.description: Detailed in this sales information card are characteristics of a focused business solution, sales benefits in positioning the solutions, and ideal customers and the business benefits they expect. Also provided are links to additional sales resources and regional contacts to get more information.

item.title: 24.04.2013 - Now available: Cloud-based Quick Start reference
item.description: Read how leading high-tech company Japan Display relies on the SAP ERP for Manufacturing rapid-deployment solution. Rolled out in less than six months using a cloud-based quick start, the solution supports the firm in achieving sustained operational excellence and profitable growth.

item.title: 03.04.2013 - New: SAP Screen Personas Sales Information Card
item.description: The sales information card outlines information on why to position, customer benefits, ideal customers, technical requirements and current pricing model. Also provided are links to other internal and external resources to help you sell SAP Screen Personas.

item.title: 15.03.2013 - Get Mobile – Your Mobile Coach is Now Available
item.description: Get Mobile – this is our call to action in 2013. As this is a different paradigm for many of you, SAP Mobile Services is ready to support. With the Mobile Coach, we are now offering personalized one-on-one coaching to help you become more proficient with Mobility and make you more successful.

item.title: 07.03.2013 - Lifecycle Management for IT Operational Efficiency (LMOE) Podcast Interview
item.description: Listen to a podcast interview with Dr. Arndt Alexander Boehnert, Head of GTM for Data and Technology Services, as he provides an overview of the LMOE offering including customer benefits and market opportunities.

item.title: 27.02.2013 - Mobile Services Interviews at Mobile World Congress 2013 in Barcelona
item.description: This week, the Mobile World Congress 2013 took place in Barcelona. During the event participants could learn how mobile ecosystem is expanding at lightning speed, with endless innovation and new applications of mobile technology.

item.title: 22.02.2013 - Best Practice: No More SAPanese
item.description: BOSS member Steve Bunyan presented a case study around the Middle East customer Bahrain Water and Electricity: Instead of talking about SAP products or LoB names, Steve focused on customer success and outcome.

item.title: 13.02.2013 - Close the Feedback Loop with the Customer
item.description: Together with top-customers the Value Prototyping team builds prototypes based on a design thinking approach. The resulting co-innovated scenarios from the prototyping, help speed time-to-value and meet customer requirements – all consistently exceeding expectations.

item.title: 08.02.2013 - Overview on Priority Services in APJ and EMEA 2013
item.description: The APJ and EMEA FKOM Services passports provide you a quick overview of the key priority Services 2013 and summarize why to position the services, how and whom to sell to, and your key regional contacts. Both documents can be downloaded from the SAP Services overview tab in the Learning Map.

item.title: 29.01.2013 - Now available: Thought Leadership sales info card and whitepaper on Retail Banking
item.description: Get the most important facts on Thought Leadership for Retail Banking on just one page and learn how to engage your customers in a discussion how they can win with a customer-centric strategy. The sales info card includes a link to the whitepaper “How to Make Customers Love Their Bank"

item.title: 18.01.2013 - Meet the DACH Mobile Services Team – Watch the 12th SUPTV episode
item.description: Meet DACH Mobile Services team members and learn about their factors to success: SAP’s mobile strategy, strong collaboration with SAP license colleagues, and the talent of their core team. Learn more about positioning SAP Discovery Workshop and customer adoption of SAP implementation services.

item.title: 20.12.2012 - New look and feel: Customer Success Asset Tool to help you find SAP Services-related references
item.description: Do you need to prepare for sales calls and face-to-face meetings with customers, close deals, or want to get more informed about SAP Services?

item.title: 14.12.2012 - The Enterprise Mobility Minute
item.description: The Enterprise Mobility Minute blog is a series of articles in which we will help guide you through the decisions you need to make to leverage mobile and other related technologies that will help your business flourish.

item.title: 04.12.2012 - Positioning Information for You
item.description: Did you miss our live Q4 services expert information sessions? Don’t worry; the following e-book recordings are available on demand.

item.title: 28.11.2012 - NEW, FRESH AND ENGAGING: New License Sales Enablement Portal Out
item.description: The SAP Services portfolio addresses your customers’ needs with comprehensive and unique offerings that are unmatched in the marketplace. Learn how SAP Services can help drive more license sales opportunities which in turn help your customers run like never before.

item.title: 21.11.2012 - New Portal Page: Value Prototyping
item.description: Value Prototyping services provide rapid, tangible proof to your customers that SAP products and solutions can exceed requirements helping to accelerate deals. The new page features all the information you will need to learn about the service offerings.

item.title: 15.11.2012 - New Assets Available - Database Services Sales Kit and Sales Information Card
item.description: SAP Database Services offer a holistic set of services ranging from database strategy and architecture assessment, to trouble shooting and ongoing management of customer databases.

item.title: 08.11.2012 - Now available: PPT versions of Thought Leadership sales info cards
item.description: If you want to engage customers in a Thought Leadership discussion on In- Memory Computing for Retail or on Enterprise Mobility, in addition to a sales info card, you can download a PPT version.
